text: Joye Evelyn Hummel (April 4, 1924April 5, 2021) was an American comic book author. She is known for writing more than 70 "Wonder Woman" stories between 1944 and 1947. Hummel died on April 5, 2021, one day after her 97th birthday, at her home in Winter Haven, Florida. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American comics writers Category:Writers from New York City
title: Joye Hummel
